response.overview: On 4 September 2023, a band of eight cyclists embarked on a 600-kilometer journey through Lombok, Indonesia; a haven of clear beaches, spicy cuisine, laid-back living, and the formidable Mt. Rinjani.  Spanning 9 days, the Wheels to Waves tour was a deliberate immersion into the island's charm, curated meticulously by Haetam since August 2020.  The goal? To savor Lombok's wonders at a deliberately unhurried pace.
response.title: Wheels to Waves: Lombok Island
